Summary: Extremely ill immediately after awakening from very disturbing dream
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Madras
There were no other sightings in Madras on or around August 25th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI have had a few sightings in my life but this event was what seemed to be a nightmare about witnessing several craft making themselves known to myslef and some friends...it was very real and I recall being chased by some type of humanoid creature. I awoke but experienced a choking sensation and extreme naseau followed by dizziness and heavy perspiring and disorientation. This has never happened to me before and I was wondering if these symptoms had occurred to others after 'dreaming' of aliens and crafts. The object that stands out most in my mind was one craft shaped like a black triangle with a shiny silver diamond shape on one surface.
